item.title: I miss my dedicated machine …
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Playing with Symfony, trying to deploy to godaddy, it’s way tooooooo troublesome, and I haven’t figure it out yet. I think I’m going to stop trying that and instead, doing all the tests on my home Ubuntu. It seems shared hosting (that’s what I’m using on godaddy) has LOT limitation makes it totally different from [...]
item.content:encoded:
Playing with Symfony, trying to deploy to godaddy, it’s way tooooooo troublesome, and I haven’t figure it out yet.

I think I’m going to stop trying that and instead, doing all the tests on my home Ubuntu. It seems shared hosting (that’s what I’m using on godaddy) has LOT limitation makes it totally different from normal setup.
